metadata.title: CVE-2021-46322 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Duktape v2.99.99 was discovered to contain a SEGV vulnerability via the component duk_push_tval in duktape/duk_api_stack.c.

notes.note: leosilva> since 5.5 is no longer upstream supported and so far we cannot patch it, marking it as ignored. mdeslaur> no indication of an upstream fix in the mysql packages, marking as deferred.

criterions.comment: duktape package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
mariadb-10.5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
mysql-8.0 package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
